GONDOLA finds himself in a room lined with fancy new machines to enjoy -- three DANCE MACHINES, three EGG MACHINES filled with plastic balls, and one VENDING MACHINE stocked with snacks and drinks. At the far corner of the room is a CLOSED PANEL, much like in the previous room, but flush with the wall.

(You can now move between 2F and 3Fa at any time!)

>Play Gond Gond Revolution.
